did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sussex County (Va.) Circuit Court Records, 1866-1941, Local government records collection, Sussex County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court papers from Sussex County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Sussex County was named for the English county, and was formed from Surry County by a statute adopted in 1753. The county court first met on 30 May 1754. The county seat is Sussex.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Sussex County (Va.) Circuit Court Records, 1866-1941, consist of Chancery Court Dockets, Clerk's correspondence, Clerk's Ledger, Dockets, Execution Docket, Fee Books, Memorandum Book, and Process Book.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Sussex County Court Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm"

controlaccess.head: Genre and Form Terms:
controlaccess.genreform: Local government records -- Virginia -- Sussex County.
